com.jgefroh.core
Interface IComponent

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractComponent
public interface IComponent

The interface for a Component.

A Component holds all of the data needed for a specific feature or function. The data in a Component is manipulated by Systems through InfoPacks.

As a rule, Components should not contain any logic. They should be entirely data. The only methods a Component should have are accessor methods (getters/setters) to retrieve its data and appropriate constructors and initializers.

Since:
0.1.0
Version:
0.2.0
Author:
Joseph Gefroh
